description: A high-performance soft-sleeve suppressor cover with a simple design.  <muzzle/suppressor_cover>  <muzzle/suppressor_cover/length>

variants.description: A soft-sleeve suppressor cover with a clean, unassuming design.  Its heat-resistance rating makes it the best model on the market.  An elaborate system of cords allows for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <muzzle/suppressor_cover/length>  <variant:black>

A soft-sleeve suppressor cover with a clean, unassuming design.  Its heat-resistance rating makes it the best model on the market.  An elaborate system of cords allows for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <muzzle/suppressor_cover/length>  <variant:fde>

//weight: we use the static stated weight, rather than the dynamic value of 0.25 oz/in, because at 7 in., this amounts to only 49.612 g, which is much too low compared to even similar models from the same company

//notes: it's considered heavy due to its large intended diameter, allowing ~1.5-in. suppressors to fit
other, 'lighter' models are available for smaller-diameter suppressors
for now, we pretend that the cover could be 'tied down' to accept smaller-diameter suppressors just as easily
description: A soft-sleeve suppressor cover with a fiberglass core.  <muzzle/suppressor_cover>  <muzzle/suppressor_cover/length>

variants.description: A soft-sleeve suppressor cover, "heavy" due to mounting over larger suppressors with ease.  Sports considerable heat resistance.  Cords over the sleeve allow for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <muzzle/suppressor_cover/length>  <variant:black>

A soft-sleeve suppressor cover, "heavy" due to mounting over larger suppressors with ease.  Sports considerable heat resistance.  Cords over the sleeve allow for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <suppressor_cover_length>  <variant:fde>

A soft-sleeve suppressor cover, "heavy" due to mounting over larger suppressors with ease.  Sports considerable heat resistance.  Cords over the sleeve allow for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <suppressor_cover_length>  <variant:grey>

A soft-sleeve suppressor cover, "heavy" due to mounting over larger suppressors with ease.  Sports considerable heat resistance.  Cords over the sleeve allow for a high degree of diameter adjustment.  <suppressor_cover_length>  <variant:multicam>

notes: trim applies to the internal part of the cover, where a suppressor would be, a space that would otherwise be empty and folded through
